body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Cook and the customer's name is Cynthia Griffin.  The conversation is about a random business (a Shoe Repair Service ) and is a conversation about inventory.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Gerald Cook, and I am with Quick Fix Shoe Repair Service.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gerald, it's nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! Can I ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Cynthia! How can I assist you today regarding our inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit worried about the availability of premium leather for my shoe repair.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern. Let me check our stock levels. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also provide your postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three, four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks, Cynthia! I’ll look into our inventory and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Cynthia. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
